description: Tim Dettmers's Which GPU(s) to Get for Deep Learning. Not sure how up-to-date this is for this year.
Optimizing models using the PyTorch JIT, likely out of date
TODO Michael Nielsen's Long-Term Memory - Augmenting Cognition
Maxwell Forbes, The PhD Metagame. Gamification of attention slowly bleeds into the ML research.
Google deep learning tuning Playbook -- maximize the performance of deep learning models. Read ~50% of this.
Umar Jamil's machine learning videos. Deep, formal and intuitive explanations with practical implementations.

Jordi Cenzano's Frame accurate video client in the browser. This was a super useful resource when we tried to figure out how to build backend-based video player in TensorPix. The idea was ditched but I would still use this approach.

Jordi Cenzano's Frame accurate video client in the browser. This was a super useful resource when we tried to figure out how to build backend-based video player in TensorPix. The idea was ditched but I would still use this approach.
Evan Hahn's Scripts I wrote that I use all the time
Art of Problem Solving's (Richard Rusczyk) Curriculum Map
A distributed lock pattern with Redis. This was quite relevant for me when I was implementing per-user distributed queueing in TensorPix.
Julia Evans's blog. Goldmine for everything. Thanks Šaja.
Jeronim Matijević's blog. Biggest CLIPpers fan I know
21 Facts About Throwing Good Parties. Some of these scream 'USA culture' and 'millennial' but relevant nonetheless.
